all_questions.question: What is the typical curve shape for the child data set?
Why does the model not generalize well to new data when trained on a small dataset?
all_questions.context: the training data for the child is maybe very small so the model learns memorizes that data too much

all_questions.question: What happens if you initialize the child model with non-random weights?
all_questions.context: if you simply continue training with the model as it was prepared as it was trained on the parent language pair

all_questions.question: What is the effect of continuing to train a child model that has already been trained on its parent data?
all_questions.context: you can get rid of the degradation due to the overfitting and you get the better performance

all_questions.question: What is the purpose of transfer learning in this context?
all_questions.context: this as is the normal case
